rules_text:
At the beginning of your draw step, if the number of cards in your library is less than half your starting deck size, draw an additional card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if the number of cards in your library is less than a quarter of your starting deck size, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.
